ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: The shimmering orb is a great item for bards.  AC 15  HP+20 - I wish I would have gotten one of these a long time ago.  For you bards who are dieing too much
ygData.messageBody:
The shimmering orb is a great item for bards. AC 15 HP+20 - I wish I would
have gotten one of these a long time ago. For you bards who are dieing 'too
much' - why not add 15 AC and see if it helps you survive more. Yes, you
give up dual wield but you contribute better alive than dead and if it means
dealing out less damage to stay alive - well so be it.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 8:51 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....


> The fork is on the squire not the scryer in Upper Guk. The scryer has
> woven grass barceltes and shimmer orbs (bard/int caster only shield)
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
